channel.title: ianwootten.co.uk - Tag: for sale
channel.description: I'm a Web Developer working at Nifty Digits in Cardiff, UK. Here, I enjoy talking code - mostly javascript. I'm @iwootten on twitter.

item.title: Out with the Old
item.author: I.M.Wootten<
item.description:
If anyone is interested in puchasing my old computer, I’m getting rid of it.

It features:

  • Athlon 2500XP Barton CPU
  • 512Mb 3200 DDR Memory
  • 80Gb 7200RPM Hard Disk
  • Sound Blaster Live Drive 5.1 with Remote Control
  • Sony DVD-ROM
  • LG 52x24x52 CDRW
  • Tyan Tachyon 128Mb G9600Pro (Ati Radeon – fully boxed)
  • 350W Levicom Blue Lit Dual Fan Power Supply (fully boxed)
  • Antec Plusview Case (with side panel) (fully boxed)
  • 17″ Hansol 710D CRT Flat Monitor
  • Logitech Keyboard/Mouse

Boxes/driver disks included, but supplied without any operating system (unless you want Ubuntu!)

All for the bargain price of £275. If you’re interested or know someone who is, please send me a message from the contact link on the right.
